speaker: Narrator
text: Miko finds you on the inn's rooftop, where you go to clear your head.

speaker: Miko
text: Nyaa~ Found you! You always come up here after a run, don't you?

speaker: Protagonist
text: Miko! I didn't hear you coming.

speaker: Miko
text: Of course you didn't! I'm very sneaky~

speaker: Miko
text: You were pretty good today! Your reflexes are getting faster. I've been watching!

speaker: Miko
text: Mmhmm! You move differently than other humans. More... fluid. Like you're dancing instead of fighting.

speaker: Miko
text: I like it! Maybe I can teach you some of my tricks? Speed is everything in a fight, you know~
